com.amwe.bokbytarapp.Model.Database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amwe.bokbytarapp.Model.Database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsibility: Static class for communicating with the firebase database Used by: AddListing, EditListing, ListingPage, AccountPage, Settings, Register, ChatRoomAdapter, MessageListAdapter, MessageListPage, ListingAdapter Uses: Item, CryptographyKeysCreator, IMessage, PrivateKey, PublicKey
    Author:
    Ali Alladin, Elias Johansson, Magnus Andersson, William Hugo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addUser(java.lang.String uid, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String base64Photo)
      Add new user to the database, not creating an authorized user, but adding public information to the database, like name
      static void deleteListing(java.lang.String id)
      Remove listing from database both from the common listings, and the user-listing specific entry
      static java.lang.String getCurrentUser() 
      static com.google.firebase.database.FirebaseDatabase getDatabase() 
      static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getDatabaseReference() 
      static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getListings() 
      static java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the user that is signed in.
      static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getPrivateKeyReference() 
      static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getPublicKeyReference() 
      static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getRefCurrentUser() 
      static void insertNewListing(Item newEntry)
      This method makes two inserts in the database, one in the common listing dataset, and one in the user-listings specific dataset, so all users can see the new listing, and so that the user who posted the listing gets an updates list of a listings posted by themselves
      static void updateListing(Item updatedListing)
      This method makes two updates in the database, one in the common listing dataset, and one in the user-listings specific dataset, so all users can see the update to a listing, and so that the user who posted the listing gets the updates
      static void useChat(IMessage message)
      Method used for sending messages.

      • addUser

        public static void addUser(java.lang.String uid,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String base64Photo)
        Add new user to the database, not creating an authorized user, but adding public information to the database, like name
        Parameters:
        uid - user id, unique
        name - of the user, matches displayName, not unique
        base64Photo -

      • deleteListing

        public static void deleteListing(java.lang.String id)
        Remove listing from database both from the common listings, and the user-listing specific entry
        Parameters:
        id - of the listing to be removed, identical in both places

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentUser()

        the String user ID for the user who is currently logged in

        the entry point for accessing the firebase database

        public static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getDatabaseReference()
        Returns:
        an firebase reference which allows read and write to database

      • getListings

        public static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getListings()
        Returns:
        the reference to the specific dataset "listings"

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the user that is signed in.
        Returns:
        displayName of user, created when user was created

      • getRefCurrentUser

        public static com.google.firebase.database.DatabaseReference getRefCurrentUser()
        Returns:
        the the databaseReference for user ID for the user who is currently logged in

      • insertNewListing

        public static void insertNewListing(Item newEntry)
        This method makes two inserts in the database, one in the common listing dataset, and one in the user-listings specific dataset, so all users can see the new listing, and so that the user who posted the listing gets an updates list of a listings posted by themselves
        Parameters:
        newEntry - The Item to be inserted in the database

      • updateListing

        public static void updateListing(Item updatedListing)
        This method makes two updates in the database, one in the common listing dataset, and one in the user-listings specific dataset, so all users can see the update to a listing, and so that the user who posted the listing gets the updates
        Parameters:
        updatedListing - The item to be updated

      • useChat

        public static void useChat(IMessage message)
        Method used for sending messages.
        Parameters:
        message, - the message being sent to the database.
